definition: chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body
flank (the side of one's torso)/to coerce/to threaten

sentences.english: To explore the effect and advantage of Bupleurum Citrus Aurtantium Liqi Decoction from Laos Trauma Section on chest sprain.
sentences.chinese: 探討柴胡枳殼理氣湯對治療胸脅挫傷的療效及優勢。

sentences.english: Xinxia Pi governance, Xiongxie pain, the drug also God.
sentences.chinese: 治心下痞，胸脅痛，神藥也。

sentences.english: Fullness and discomfort in chest and hypochondrium …
sentences.chinese: 感覺胸脅部脹悶不適的症狀。

definition: disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
(TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
shaking in fear/one's heart palpitating with fear
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
excess of yang 陽|阳[yang2] in TCM
